text: Serretta Diane Wilson (born 8 September 1951) Virginia, Birth Records, 1912-2014, Delayed Birth Records, 1854-1911 is an American-born British television and film actress. She was born in Fairfax, Virginia. She has played parts in The Zoo Gang, The Borgias and London Bridge on television, and small roles in films such as Up the Chastity Belt (1972), Tower of Evil (1972), Our Miss Fred (1972), Psychomania (1973), Keep It Up Downstairs (1976) and Sweeney 2 (1978). She also appeared as Sergeant Wilson's estranged daughter in the Dad's Army episode "Getting the Bird" (1972). In the Space: 1999 episode Dorzak, Serretta plays the part of refugee. == References == == External links == * Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:British television actresses Category:British film actresses Category:People from Fairfax, Virginia
title: Serretta Wilson
